docs.snippet: The vote for the hosting of the 2022 World Cup must be re-run if corruption allegations surrounding Qatar's winning campaign are proved to be accurate, Lord Goldsmith, a member of FIFA's Independent Governance Committee, said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The vote for the hosting of the 2022 World Cup must be re-run if corruption allegations surrounding Qatar's winning campaign are proved to be accurate, Lord Goldsmith, a member of FIFA's Independent Governance Committee, said on Monday.

headline.main: 2022 Vote Must Be Re-Run if Corruption Proved-Goldsmith
headline.print_headline: 2022 Vote Must Be Re-Run if Corruption Proved-Goldsmith
